message.body: There's a book called 'the open circle'. It is about peter brook's theatre environments. So if you're up for it, thats my recommendation.
That's a great recommendation! I'll check it out. So good to hear from you. How are you?
I am well. Done with guthrie things. Started a temp job downtown. Moving to a new place in a couple days. Things are happening, i guess. Still loving philly?
I do love what I'm doing but I'm not crazy about Philly when I know the greatness of mpls. Where's the temp job? And what's next theatre wise?
Greatness of mpls. Thats a phrase. It is in the campbell mithun building doing aa work for the it dept of a marketing corporation. It'll work.
That's right. Well best of luck! Keep in touch. :)
